synopsis.text: Kyouya Hashiba is a 28-year-old video game developer who has hit rock bottom. After losing his job when his company goes bankrupt, he moves back in with his parents, filled with regret over the path he chose. As he looks at his peers finding success in creative fields, he wishes for a second chance to follow his true passions. Incredibly, Kyouya gets transported back in time 10 years, to right before he started college. With the benefit of hindsight, he decides to enroll in the prestigious arts academy he had passed up originally. Now living in a co-ed dorm with fellow aspiring artists, Kyouya dedicates himself wholeheartedly to his studies alongside classmates who will one day be famous creators themselves. This uplifting story follows Kyouya as he remakes his life by pursuing his creative dreams. With passion, camaraderie, and a little magic, he transforms both his future and relationships. Though the path presents unexpected challenges, Kyouya learns that itâ€™s never too late to rewrite your story and follow your heart.
